events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product is not what I originally purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery as reported by the customer.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the customer.
Hello, I’m Emma from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue and I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with the order number to help us process your refund quickly?
I have attached the photos of the wrong item and included the order number as requested. Please let me know if you need any more information.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you confirmation once the amount has been credited to your original payment method.
I appreciate your prompt response and the immediate action to process my refund. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.
The refund has been processed and should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days. Please let us know if you encounter any further issues.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, the refund has arrived in my account, and I’m very satisfied with the support provided. Thank you once again!
We are closing this case now as your refund has been successfully processed and you’re satisfied with the resolution.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support team. Your feedback is very important to us.
The customer completed the survey providing positive feedback and high ratings for quick refund processing and helpful support.
This support case has been archived automatically after a period of inactivity following closure and survey completion.
